- * The TinyTables protocol has to phases - a preprocessing and an online phase. In the + * The TinyTables protocol has two phases - a preprocessing and an online phase. In the * preprocessing phase, each of the two players picks his additive share of a mask for each input * wire of a protocol. Furthermore, for each AND protocol each of the two players must also * calculate a so-called TinyTable which is used in the online phase (see {@link

@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
